ch0127_00_mikuri/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah! Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Good to see you again.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0101_0701_02_10:
Care to join my Pokémon and me as we grace
the streets of Pasio with our presence today?
ch0127_00_mikuri/0601_0701_01_10:
My good friend Steven is the Champion of the
Hoenn region. When it comes to Pokémon battling,
he’s the best of the best.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0601_0701_02_10:
But funnily enough, he’d rather spend his time
searching for rare stones than dominating on
the battlefield.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0601_0701_03_10:
He’s a bit of an eccentric, Steven. But every time
I see him, I feel driven to accomplish greater
deeds myself.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0601_0702_01_10:
Steven is my friend, but he’s also my rival!
I couldn’t ask for a more perfect relationship.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0601_0702_02_10:
Do you have someone like that in your life?
If you do, you should treasure your friendship
with that person.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0602_0701_01_10:
Isn’t my partner the most gorgeous Water-type
Pokémon you’ve ever laid eyes on?
ch0127_00_mikuri/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s because the two of us are a perfect pair!
She never skips out on our beauty routine.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0602_0701_03_10:
In case you’re wondering, crystal-clear water
and endless love are the two most essential
steps in our beauty routine.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0602_0702_01_10:
I put the same amount of care into maintaining
my beauty as my partner does her own. Our
beauty routine is something we share.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0602_0702_02_10:
We’re two peas in a pod, my Pokémon and I!
Always aiming to better ourselves, both inside
and out.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0603_0701_01_10:
I try to always keep a smile on my face, even
during Pokémon battles.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0603_0701_02_10:
Teary eyes and angry scowls don’t help anyone
in a serious battle. In a situation like that, you
have to be able to smile.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0603_0701_03_10:
When I perform water illusions with my Pokémon,
it’s to make everyone around us smile!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0603_0702_01_10:
Pasio has become a gathering place for so many
magnificent sync pairs.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0603_0702_02_10:
I hope that in battling one another all across this
island, we can make our time here together
really worthwhile!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0604_0701_01_10:
Sootopolis City, where my Gym is located,
is known as “the mystical city where history
slumbers.” I hope you’ll come and visit sometime!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0604_0701_02_10:
You’ll be positively charmed by the beautiful
walls of the crater the city is located within and
the ocean waters that surround it!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0604_0701_03_10:
I’m sure the people of Sootopolis would welcome
a lover of Pokémon like you with open arms!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0604_0702_01_10:
Pasio, a completely artificial island, and
Sootopolis, a city with a storied, rich culture...
In a way, they’re opposites, aren’t they!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0604_0702_02_10:
You’ll have to wait and see what sorts of illusions
my Pokémon and I brought with us to Pasio.
Trust me—you won’t want to miss them!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0605_0701_01_10:
You seem to be constantly surrounded by brilliant
sync pairs, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0127_00_mikuri/0605_0701_02_10:
You must be tremendously talented to have drawn
all of that amazing talent to you!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0605_0701_03_10:
And spending precious time with your teammates
is sure to make you even more spectacular. Let’s
soar to greater heights together, my friend!
ch0127_00_mikuri/0605_0702_01_10:
The shining light you and your Pokémon possess
has had quite an impact on me, you know.
ch0127_00_mikuri/0605_0702_02_10:
In my eyes, you’re one of the most magnificent
sync pairs I’ve had the privilege of meeting here
on Pasio.
ch0127_00_mikuri/1701_0701_01_10: I always see you trying your very best out there.
ch0127_00_mikuri/1701_0701_02_10:
I’d like to give you a little something for all
your hard work!
ch0127_00_mikuri/1701_0702_01_10:
I hope it serves you well. Keep on keeping on,
my friend!
ch0127_00_mikuri/2501_0701_01_10:
Sync pairs...a unique work of art brought to life
here on Pasio. A beautiful partnership—something
I chase after myself.
ch0127_00_mikuri/2501_0701_02_10:
So far, you and your partner are the most stunning
sync pair I’ve had the fortune to meet here.
So close to what I would consider ideal!
ch0127_00_mikuri/2501_0702_01_10:
If I could, I would follow you throughout your
journey as you learn and grow. It would be a
privilege to train alongside you!
ch0127_00_mikuri/2501_0702_02_10:
Someday, if you’re ever in the Hoenn region,
perhaps we could face off against each other
in a Pokémon contest...
ch0127_00_mikuri/2501_0702_03_10:
A battle at the Pokémon League could be
interesting as well. Something to look forward to.
ch0127_00_mikuri/2511_0701_01_10:
I have a niece named Lisia. She’s about the same
age as you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0127_00_mikuri/2511_0701_02_10:
I would love to introduce you two sometime.
I feel like she could grow a lot with you as a
role model.
ch0127_00_mikuri/2511_0701_03_10:
Hm-hmm... Uh-oh. Am I turning into one of those
annoying uncles that butts into everyone’s lives?
ch0127_00_mikuri/2511_0701_04_10:
I just want to see you all grow up happily ever
after. Is that so bad?
ch0127_00_mikuri/2511_0702_01_10:
My former master, Juan, always doted on me
when I was in training.
ch0127_00_mikuri/2511_0702_02_10:
Now that I’m in a similar position, I think I
understand the feeling.
ch0127_00_mikuri/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. How is the day treating you
so far? My Pokémon and I are poised to
impress, as always.
ch0127_00_mikuri/3002_0701_01_10:
Training first thing in the morning? My, aren’t we
ambitious! Your future will shine with success.
Of that I am sure.
ch0127_00_mikuri/3003_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re in need of some respite.
Sit back... Allow my aquatic illusions to put you
at ease.
ch0127_00_mikuri/3004_0701_01_10:
The quiet sounds of flowing water always put
my heart at ease. What sort of sounds make
you feel most calm?
ch0127_00_mikuri/3005_0701_01_10:
Burning the midnight oil, I see. It’s that sort of
tenacity that will make you shine even brighter.
ch0127_00_mikuri/3006_0701_01_10:
Gazing up at the starry night sky with my
Pokémon is one of my favorite pastimes.
